SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.interfaces

Interface IStudent

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentImpl
public interface IStudent
Provides methods for managing student-related operations in the School Management System.

This interface defines the CRUD operations and additional methods for handling student data. Implementations of this interface should provide the actual logic for interacting with the student data in the database.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      void addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a new student to the system.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student object to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student object is null

    • getStudentById

      Student getStudentById(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Retrieves a student by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      the Student object with the specified ID
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if no student with the specified ID is found

    • getAllStudents

      List<Student> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves a list of all students in the system.
      Returns:
      a List of Student objects

    • updateStudent

      void updateStudent(Student student) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing student.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student object containing updated information
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the student with the specified ID does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student object is null

    • deleteStudent

      void deleteStudent(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Deletes a student from the system by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student to be deleted
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if no student with the specified ID is found
